1.text: Beat the eggs in a bowl with a fork or whisk.

2.text: Heat the butter in a skillet over medium-high heat.

3.text: Pour the eggs into the skillet and turn the burner to low.

4.text: Stir and cook the eggs for 3 to 4 minutes.

5.text: Serve the scrambled eggs immediately for the best texture.

6.text: Put the eggs and seasonings into a microwave-safe bowl.

7.text: Whisk the mixture until it's combined.

8.text: Microwave the eggs for 1 1/2 minutes using high power.

9.text: Stir in a little butter for a richer flavor.

10.text: Mix in a dollop of dairy for extra-creamy scrambled eggs.

11.text: Add your favorite cheese if you want a richer flavor.

12.text: Stir in meat for an extra savory flavor.

13.text: Include fresh herbs for a brighter flavor.

14.text: Garnish the eggs with your favorite sauce or spice for a unique flavor.
